main.name: Elshadai Tegegn
main.description: A software engineering student, an entrepreneur, a basketball player, and a community leader
main.bio: I am a full-stack web developer and mobile application developer. I have mostly worked on NodeJS, ReactJS, Django, and Flask. I love mobile application development using Flutter. I also have the expertise of development in Android using either Java or Kotlin. I have also worked on consultation in technology. My hobbies are reading, playing basketball, coding, and teaching.

education.description: Working on extracurricular activities on campus: ITSC Inspire (Event Organizer), Yellow Movement(Project Coordinator), Chalk-the-talk (Project Director), GDG Addis & WTM Addis (Event Organizer)
Program leadership candidate, President of 2020/21 ShARE leadership program, Took entrepreneurship, leadership, consultation, and communication courses
Earned scholarship on Second Cohort Women Intake Program, funded by IFC, and took NodeJS programming with very great distinction completion

work.title: Freelancer

work.title: Volunteer Instructor
